Just want to add this for add'l info:
*Uncheck option "Enabled Self-Defense". Reboot your computer and apply the fix. (If still there is a message, go to Safe Mode [Reboot and press F8] and apply the fix there, it worked well for me.)
-----
Note: 
-If you want to keep Self-Defense ENABLED after applying the fix, trial will only reset on computer reboot.
-If you keep Self-Defense DISABLED trial will be reset once daily without rebooting the computer.

;)
